unbond.description: unbond defines the unbonding information of a delegation.

QueryUnbondingDelegationResponse.title: Query Unbonding Delegation Response
QueryUnbondingDelegationResponse.description: QueryDelegationResponse is response type for the Query/UnbondingDelegation RPC method.

delegator_address.description: delegator_address is the encoded address of the delegator.

validator_address.description: validator_address is the encoded address of the validator.

entries.description: entries are the unbonding delegation entries.  unbonding delegation entries

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.UnbondingDelegati.title: Unbonding Delegation
cosmos.staking.v1beta1.UnbondingDelegati.description: UnbondingDelegation stores all of a single delegator's unbonding bonds for a single validator in an time-ordered list.

creation_height.description: creation_height is the height which the unbonding took place.

completion_time.description: completion_time is the unix time for unbonding completion.

initial_balance.description: initial_balance defines the tokens initially scheduled to receive at completion.

balance.description: balance defines the tokens to receive at completion.

unbonding_id.description: Incrementing id that uniquely identifies this entry

unbonding_on_hold_ref_count.description: Strictly positive if this entry's unbonding has been stopped by external modules

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.UnbondingDelegati.title: Unbonding Delegation Entry
cosmos.staking.v1beta1.UnbondingDelegati.description: UnbondingDelegationEntry defines an unbonding object with relevant metadata.
